meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unbiased.
meanings.sent1: Her unbiasednesses in decision-making impressed everyone in the team.
meanings.sent2: Journalists strive for unbiasednesses in their reporting to ensure fairness.
meanings.sent3: The unbiasednesses of the referee made the soccer game more enjoyable for both teams.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of opinions, her unbiasednesses shone like a beacon of truth.
meanings.sent5: The unbiasednesses of the judge were crucial in delivering a just verdict.

meanings.definition: The absence of bias or prejudice.
meanings.sent1: The unbiasednesses of the study ensured the results were reliable.
meanings.sent2: Diversity training aims to promote unbiasednesses in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: His unbiasednesses towards all candidates made the election process smoother.
meanings.sent4: The unbiasednesses of the jury was evident in their fair deliberation.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's unbiasednesses created a safe space for students to express themselves freely.
